description: Hello there, Batman. The Riddler here, I see you've entered the Green Room; a chamber wired with traps, flickering neon puzzles, and screens watching your every move. Your wit will be tested.

choices.result: The room glows eerily. A screen flickers â€” a riddle appears!

riddles.question: I'm not alive, but I can grow; I don't have lungs, but I need air. What am I?

choices.result: You stumble in darkness... and suddenly, a voice echoes with a riddle!

riddles.question: What has to be broken before you can use it?

description: Ah Batman... welcome to the Icebox Lab. Cold fog clings to the floor, and icicles hang from rusted pipes. Every sound echoes in the frozen silence.

choices.result: Frost billows out. Inside... a riddle carved in ice!

riddles.question: The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I

choices.result: The ice cracks. A whisper from within challenges you with a riddle.

riddles.question: I have no voice but can be heard. I can crack but never bleed. What am I?

description: Welcome to the Laughing Lounge, Bats. A circus mirror room of madness. Graffiti, balloon animals, and laughing gas hang in the air. The lights flicker... and so does your sanity.

choices.result: The cards scatter. A Joker card flips... a riddle is printed beneath.

riddles.question: I can be cracked, made, told, and played. What am I?

choices.result: POP! Laughter fills the room... then silence. A riddle hangs in the air.

riddles.question: What has keys but can't open locks?

description: Curiosity got the bat? ... Red velvet curtains. Jewelry cases. Laser traps flicker like claws in the dark. You've stepped into the thief's lair, where elegance masks danger.

choices.text: Take the tag from the cat statue
choices.result: The statue purrs. A green laser highlights... a riddle engraved below.

riddles.question: I go up but never come down. What am I?

choices.text: Try to unlock the red safe
choices.result: Click. Click. A hiss. A note slides out with a riddle scrawled on it.

riddles.question: What gets wetter the more it dries?

description: Nature welcomes you, Batman. But beware; vines twist through broken walls. Glowing flowers pulsate gently in the toxic air. Step carefully, the plants are alive, and they're watching.

choices.result: The flower pulses, then wilts. A voice from the vines whispers a riddle.

riddles.question: What has hands but can't clap?

choices.result: The bee stops at a blossom. A riddle is sung by the petals.

riddles.question: What kind of room has no doors or windows?

description: This is the last step, detective. You've come far. But the question remains ... did you win?

riddles.question: You've either saved Gotham or sealed its fate. Click the button to see your ending.
